column4: So I have been fooling around with the 8.04 beta and the wubi installation method and I think it is brilliant. However, at the beginning of the process you are asked to specify a size for the installation and I have a few questions about that.
One does the file created "grow" or does it start out full size, and two is it possible to change that file size at a later date?
I would choose around 8-10GB for an install. Ubuntu can see NTFS flie systems and can "share" the Windows C: drive.
